Pipelines

class celltk.core.pipeline.Pipeline(parent_folder=None, output_folder=None, image_folder=None, mask_folder=None, track_folder=None, array_folder=None, name=None, frame_rng=None, skip_frames=None, file_extension='tif', overwrite=True, log_file=True, yaml_path=None, verbose=False, _split_key='&')

Pipeline organizes running Operations on saved images.

Parameters

  • parent_folder (Optional[str]) – Location of the raw images

  • output_folder (Optional[str]) – Location to store outputs. Defaults to ‘parent_folder/outputs’

  • image_folder (Optional[str]) – Location of images if different from parent_folder or output_folder

  • mask_folder (Optional[str]) – Location of masks if different from parent_folder or output_folder

  • track_folder (Optional[str]) – Location of tracks if different from parent_folder or output_folder

  • array_folder (Optional[str]) – Location of arrays if different from parent_folder or output_folder

  • name (Optional[str]) – Used to identify output array. Defaults to name parent_folder.

  • frame_rng (Optional[Tuple[int]]) – Specify the frames to be loaded and used. If a single int, will load that many images. Otherwise designates the bounds of the range.

  • skip_frames (Optional[Tuple[int]]) – Use to specify frames to be skipped. For example, frames that are out of focus.

  • file_extension (str) – File extension of image files to be loaded

  • ovewrite – If True, outputs in output_folder are overwritten

  • log_file (bool) – If True, save log outputs to a text file in output folder

  • yaml_path (Optional[str]) – Path to yaml file defining the Pipeline to be run

  • verbose (bool) – If True, increases logging verbosity

  • _split_key (str) – Used to specify outputs from functions that return multiple outputs. For example, if you align two channels the outputs will be saved as ‘align&channel000’ and ‘align&channel001’.

Returns

None

add_operations(operation)

Adds Operations to the Pipeline.

Parameters

operation (Collection[Operation]) – A single operation or collection of operations to be run in the order passed

Saves Pipeline configuration as a YAML file

Parameters

  • fname (Optional[str]) – Name of the YAML file. Defaults to parent_folder

class celltk.core.orchestrator.Orchestrator(yaml_folder=None, parent_folder=None, output_folder=None, match_str=None, image_folder=None, mask_folder=None, track_folder=None, array_folder=None, condition_map={}, position_map=None, cond_map_only=False, name='experiment', frame_rng=None, skip_frames=None, file_extension='tif', overwrite=True, log_file=True, save_master_df=True, job_controller=None, verbose=True)

Orchestrator organizes running multiple Pipelines on a set of folders

Parameters

  • yaml_folder (Optional[str]) – Path to location of Pipeline yamls

  • parent_folder (Optional[str]) – Location of the folders with raw images

  • output_folder (Optional[str]) – Location to store outputs. Defaults to ‘parent_folder/outputs’

  • match_str (Optional[str]) – If provided, folders that do not contain match_str are excluded from analysis

  • image_folder (Optional[str]) – Location of images if different from parent_folder or output_folder

  • mask_folder (Optional[str]) – Location of masks if different from parent_folder or output_folder

  • track_folder (Optional[str]) – Location of tracks if different from parent_folder or output_folder

  • array_folder (Optional[str]) – Location of arrays if different from parent_folder or output_folder

  • condition_map (dict) – Dictionoary that maps folder names too the condition in the experiment. i.e {A1-Site_0: control}

  • position_map (Union[dict, Callable, None]) – If multiple positions have the same condition position map is used to uniquely identify them

  • cond_map_only (bool) – If True, folders not in cond_map are not run. Only used if condition_map is provided.

  • name (str) – Used to identify output array. Defaults to name parent_folder.

  • frame_rng (Optional[Tuple[int]]) – Specify the frames to be loaded and used. If a single int, will load that many images. Otherwise designates the bounds of the range.

  • skip_frames (Optional[Tuple[int]]) – Use to specify frames to be skipped. For example, frames that are out of focus.

  • file_extension (str) – File extension of image files to be loaded

  • ovewrite – If True, outputs in output_folder are overwritten

  • log_file (bool) – If True, save log outputs to a text file in output folder

  • save_master_df (bool) – If True, saves a single hdf5 file containing the data from all of the pipelines

  • job_controller (Optional[JobController]) – If given, controls how pipelines are run

  • verbose (bool) – If True, increases logging verbosity

Returns

None

add_operations(operation, index=- 1)

Adds Operations to the Orchestrator and all pipelines.

Parameters

  • operation (Collection[Operation]) – A single operation or collection of operations to be run in the order passed

  • index (int) – If given, dictates where to insert the new operations

Return type

None

Returns

None

update_condition_map(condition_map={}, path=None)

Adds conditions to each of the Pipelines in Orchestrator

Parameters

  • condition_map (dict) – Dictionoary that maps folder names too the condition in the experiment. i.e {A1-Site_0: control}

  • path (Optional[str]) – If given, loads a condition map from the file found at path. Overwrites condition_map.

Return type

None

Returns

None
